entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
